A

ACTION_DOWN - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.InputEvent
Action code for an event whose source is being pressed for the first time.
ACTION_MOVE - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.InputEvent
Action code for an event whose source is being moved or changed.
ACTION_NONE - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.InputEvent
Action code when there is no action.
ACTION_UP - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.InputEvent
Action code for an event whose source is being released.

B

BINDING - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.Status
The FlitchioController is trying to bind to the Flitchio Manager app.
BINDING_FAILED - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.Status
The FlitchioController couldn't bind to the Flitchio Manager app, or the previous binding has ended unexpectedly.
BOUND - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.Status
The FlitchioController has successfully bound to the Flitchio Manager app.
BUTTON_BOTTOM - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.InputElement

BUTTON_TOP - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.InputElement
Button at the top of Flitchio.
ButtonEvent - Class in com.supenta.flitchio.sdk
Object used to report button events.
BUTTONS - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.InputElement
Collection of all the InputElement.Buttons of Flitchio.

com.supenta.flitchio.sdk - package com.supenta.flitchio.sdk
 
CONNECTED - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.Status
The FlitchioController is bound to the Flitchio Manager app and Flitchio is connected to the phone.

D

DISCONNECTED - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.Status
The FlitchioController is bound to the Flitchio Manager app and Flitchio is disconnected from the phone.

equals(Object) - Method in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.Status
 

F

failureReason - Variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.Status
If this status' Status.code is Status.BINDING_FAILED, this holds the reason of the failure and its value is either one of Status.FailingStatus.REASON_MANAGER_UNUSABLE, Status.FailingStatus.REASON_SERVICE_REFUSED_CONNECTION, Status.FailingStatus.REASON_SERVICE_UNREACHABLE or Status.FailingStatus.REASON_SERVICE_SHUTDOWN_CONNECTION.
FlitchioController - Class in com.supenta.flitchio.sdk
Object providing the main communication channel to the Flitchio Manager app.
FlitchioEventListener - Interface in com.supenta.flitchio.sdk
Listener of Flitchio events: button state changed, joystick position changed.
FlitchioSnapshot - Class in com.supenta.flitchio.sdk
Object describing a consistent state of Flitchio at a given moment.
FlitchioStatusListener - Interface in com.supenta.flitchio.sdk
Listener of FlitchioController lifecycle events, like binding/unbinding, and connection/disconnection of Flitchio.

I

InputElement - Class in com.supenta.flitchio.sdk
Base class describing the input elements of Flitchio: buttons and joysticks.
InputElement.Button - Class in com.supenta.flitchio.sdk
Object identifying a button of Flitchio.
InputElement.Button.DpadButton - Class in com.supenta.flitchio.sdk
Object identifying a special button of Flitchio that is actually one of the four directions of a joystick.
InputElement.Joystick - Class in com.supenta.flitchio.sdk
Object identifying a joystick of Flitchio.
InputEvent<T extends InputElement> - Class in com.supenta.flitchio.sdk
Base class for button and joystick events that are fired in listening mode.

R

REASON_MANAGER_UNUSABLE - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.Status.FailingStatus
The Flitchio Manager app is not installed on the user's phone, or the version that is installed doesn't support this version of the SDK.
REASON_SERVICE_REFUSED_CONNECTION - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.Status.FailingStatus
This controller has not been accepted by the Flitchio Manager app.
REASON_SERVICE_SHUTDOWN_CONNECTION - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.Status.FailingStatus
The binding with the Flitchio Manager app ended unexpectedly.
REASON_SERVICE_UNREACHABLE - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.Status.FailingStatus
The Flitchio Manager app exists but cannot be reached.

S

STATE_PRESSED - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.FlitchioSnapshot
State of a button that is being pressed.
STATE_PRESSING - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.FlitchioSnapshot
State of a button that is being pressed for the first time.
STATE_RELEASED - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.FlitchioSnapshot
State of a button that is not pressed.
STATE_RELEASING - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.FlitchioSnapshot
State of a button that is being released.
Status - Class in com.supenta.flitchio.sdk
Object describing the status of a FlitchioController.
Status.FailingStatus - Class in com.supenta.flitchio.sdk
Subclass of Status describing that a failure has happened.

U

UNBOUND - Static variable in class com.supenta.flitchio.sdk.Status
The previous binding between FlitchioController and the Flitchio Manager app has been terminated properly.
